comments.body: How about a code snapshot instead? These line numbers could change over time.
The line numbers won't change because I linked to them at a particular commit hash rather than at HEAD. But if you still think inlining code snippets is better, I can do that.
No its fine. This satisfies the intended purpose. LGTM

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +13,17 @@  3. Pick whether you want to distinguish different categories of things using labels on the metric. If so, add "Vec" to the name of the type of metric you want and add a slice of the label names to the definition.

   https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/kubernetes/blob/cd3299307d44665564e1a5c77d0daa0286603ff5/pkg/apiserver/apiserver.go#L53
   https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/kubernetes/blob/cd3299307d44665564e1a5c77d0daa0286603ff5/pkg/kubelet/metrics/metrics.go#L31
